message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I really like the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $15,000 represents the value I see in this product, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we settle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle at $11,500?
